edu.ucla.sspace.matrix

Interface AtomicMatrix

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Matrix
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomicGrowingMatrix, AtomicGrowingSparseHashMatrix, AtomicGrowingSparseMatrix, SynchronizedMatrix, SynchronizedSparseMatrix

    public interface AtomicMatrix
extends Matrix
    An interface for any Matrix which wants to support atomic behavior. All implementations must be thread safe such that each operation is atomic. It is acceptable for several operations to be many read, but anytime a modification operation takes place, there must be only one thread performing a modification and no other threads reading data.
    Author:
    David Jurgens

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface edu.ucla.sspace.matrix.Matrix

      Return the value stored at (row, col), and add delta to the same index.

    • Method Detail

      • getAndAdd

        double getAndAdd(int row,
               int col,
               double delta)
        Return the value stored at (row, col), and add delta to the same index.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the cell to return and modify.
        col - The column of the cell to return and modify.
        delta - The amount to change the specified cell.
        Returns:
        The value of the cell at (row, col) prior to adding delta.

      • addAndGet

        double addAndGet(int row,
               int col,
               double delta)
        Return the value stored at (row, col) plus delta, and then increment the specified cell by delta.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the cell to modify and return.
        col - The column of the cell to modify and return.
        delta - The amount to change the specified cell.
        Returns:
        The value of the cell at (row, col) after adding delta.
